data.message: Hi facebook, I would just like to report my account because when my friend open her fb on my phone so she would log out my acc. and when I was about to open my account it says that the password that I enter is incorrect when infact the password is correct and i don't have backups on that account. please help me all of my contacts are in there and mthe name of that account is Joanna Pelaez hoping for your response thanks!

replies.message: Hey Joanna. If you're having trouble logging into your Facebook account, here are a few things to try first: http://bit.ly/2i3sU1z. -Kiara
